about.title: ORA DENTAL PRACTICE
about.description: The name "ORA" comes from our passion for dentistry and our desire to create a welcoming and professional place for patients.
about.more: The word "ORA" was chosen for its meaning and also for its pleasant sound. In Latin, "Ora" is associated with the words "mouth" or "speech." The term also evokes the idea of health, well-being, and beauty, aligning perfectly with the clinic's mission to provide quality dental care to improve the oral health and confidence of each patient.
about.more2: Thus, this name reflects both the professionalism and vision of our dentists, while also evoking concepts of health, beauty, and trust.

treatments.title: CUSTOMIZED TREATMENTS
treatments.more: Our multidisciplinary team includes qualified dentists specializing in various fields. All treatments are performed directly at the clinic, including check-ups, conservative care, orthodontics, or surgeries, providing our patients an access to a complete technical platform in one location.

teams.title: Our team
teams.description: " Your path to your new smile begins here "

contact.title: Private parking reserved for patients
contact.description: In case of emergency, please call us directly. We will make every effort to accommodate you and provide relief as quickly as possible within the same day.

folder.title: Book Your Appointment
folder.description: all rights reserved. ora dental practice

treatments.title: COSMETIC DENTISTRY
treatments.question: Want to correct smile imperfections?
treatments.description: Cosmetic dentistry enhances the appearance of your teeth through treatments like whitening, veneers, and crowns, improving the shape, color, and alignment for a more aesthetic and harmonious smile.

treatments.title: TEETH WHITENING
treatments.question: Wish for a brighter smile?
treatments.description: Our simple and effective treatment, using custom-made trays at home or a single-session in-office procedure, can brighten your teeth several shades.

treatments.title: MPLANTOLOGY
treatments.question: Need to replace missing teeth?
treatments.description: Implantology involves replacing missing teeth with artificial titanium “roots”, supporting dental prostheses such as crowns, bridges, or removable prostheses for long-term aesthetic and functional restoration.

treatments.title: ORTHODONTICS
treatments.question: Seeking improved teeth alignment?
treatments.description: Orthodontics aligns and corrects teeth and jaw positions for children, adolescents, and adults. Our orthodontists, Dr. Zeidan and Dr. Hussein, use braces, removable devices, or transparent aligners to enhance smiles and correct occlusion issues.

treatments.title: ORAL SURGERY
treatments.question: Stomatology focuses on diseases and treatments of the entire mouth, including extractions, temporomandibular joint disorders, tumors, or oral lesions.
treatments.description: Dr. Freminet handles a wide range of oral issues.

treatments.title: DENTAL PROSTHESES
treatments.question: Dental prostheses replace missing teeth.
treatments.description: Either as removable options like partial or full dentures or fixed options like bridges or crowns. Such prostheses aim to restore masticatory function and smile aesthetics.

treatments.title: CONSERVATIVE CARE
treatments.question: Looking to preserve your oral health?
treatments.description: Essential conservative treatments, such as scaling, cavity treatments, and restorations, play a crucial role in preventing and treating dental problems, preserving your teeth for as long as possible.

treatments.title: GUM CARE
treatments.question: Experiencing bleeding or receding gums?
treatments.description: Periodontology focuses on the health of the tissues supporting the teeth, such as the gums and the bone around the teeth. The goal is to maintain these tissues in good health to keep the teeth strong and well-rooted, and to rediscover the pleasure of a healthy and comfortable mouth.

treatments.title: Endodontics
treatments.question: Endodontics focuses on the internal treatment of the tooth.
treatments.description: When a tooth is infected or severely damaged, it is necessary to perform a root canal treatment to remove the infected pulp, clean the inside of the tooth, and then seal it to prevent infection and preserve the natural tooth. Dr. Mourot is specialized in endodontics. She treats infected or damaged teeth under a microscope to preserve your natural teeth.

treatments.title: PEDIATRIC DENTISTRY
treatments.question: Pedodontics focuses on dental care for children, offering preventive exams, care for baby teeth, and oral hygiene advice for the younger ones.
treatments.description: Il est recommandé, à titre préventif, de les familiariser avec le cabinet dentaire dès leur plus jeune âge.

treatments.title: OCCLUSODONTICS
treatments.question: Facing jaw pain or clicking?
treatments.description: Occlusodontics studies how upper and lower teeth fit when the mouth is closed. It aims to understand and correct temporomandibular joint issues in order to improved comfort, chewing function, and reduced jaw muscle tension.

treatments.title: HYALURONIC ACID INJECTIONS
treatments.question: Our dentists offer dermal fillers to enhance the appearance of areas around the mouth, addressing lips, wrinkles, or folds, for a more youthful and aesthetic look in harmony with your smile.
treatments.description: Cela peut aider à restaurer ou à augmenter le volume, à lisser les rides ou à redessiner les contours pour obtenir un aspect plus jeune et plus esthétique, en harmonie avec votre sourire.
